message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by myself. Given its high quality and unique features, it's perfect for someone like you who appreciates exceptional value. Considering its worth to me and its market value, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $140. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to its usual price. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. If you're interested, please let me know and we can finalize the details promptly.
